summary: Feature request to automatically create tracing spans for schedule creation when the tracing interceptor is active, with workflow header integration and opt-out capability for users.
userImpact: Users relying on tracing instrumentation must manually handle span creation for schedules, leading to incomplete observability when schedules trigger workflows.
proposedFix: Implement automatic span creation in the tracing interceptor when schedules are created, with span propagation to workflow headers and configurable opt-out mechanism.
keyQuote: When the tracing interceptor is in use, by default creating a schedule should create a span for the schedule and set it on the workflow header if the action is starting a workflow.
